description.displayText: Khensani was an excellent caretaker for my father after his surgery. We needed someone to be present daily and provide support. He expressed how much he enjoyed her company and the ease of communication he had with her. She provide an ear for conversation and ensured he was able get his various needs taking care of by communicating efficiently with his nurses and therapist. We would definitely hire her for future opportunities.
